Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Ridgeland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Ridgeland. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
